title: Sister Odell, Alex Trebek Cancer Update, Stephen A. Smith and more
itunes:title: Sister Odell, Alex Trebek Cancer Update, Stephen A. Smith and more
description:
Happy Wednesday and welcome to the ride! Sister Odell stops by to share her thoughts on the Presidential Democratic candidates. Alec Trebek announces an update on his pancreatic cancer status with a request for prayers. Stephen A. Smith tell us how he really feels about the Cleveland Browns before promoting the HBCU College Fair in Wilmington, Delaware. The crew give a lowdown on Dancing With the Stars and Sean Spicer and Lamar Odom’s painful performances. Amber Guyger’s request of relocating her trial was denied. Junior is frustrated with NFL players’ antics. General Motors strike continues.




Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
